project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Implement a Python-based quiz game that presents multiple-choice questions to users, tracks their scores, and displays the results at the end.

task.name: Define the questions and answers variable
Implement the function to display the quiz questions
Implement functionality to track the user's score
Implement the final score display feature
Write tests for each of the implemented features
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
